modules.title: MODULE 1
modules.subtitle: SOCIAL MEDIA MANAGEMENT
modules.overview: Social Media has the power to reach the unreachable. It’s one of the easiest ways to reach the masses as 52% of India’s population has access to the internet and is active on Social media. In this module, we will help you get your business socially active.
points: The basics of all the social media platforms (Facebook & Instagram) – Planning,
Strategizing, Scheduling, and Promoting
Strategies and create a monthly calendar and implement the same for your small/medium or big business
The best-performing content types that are tried and tested with big brands
How to set up all platforms, how to gain followers, and the best means to engage them
How a non-designer can unravel their designing skills using different tools
The importance of #Hashtags and how to make the best use of its reach
Local, national, and global case studies of brands that have aced the social media game with their viral content
What are the different types of content bucket
Campaign checklist
How to write the perfect description
Things to do to kickstart Social media for a new brand
How to do a competitor analysis
Types of posts designs
Content tips that work wonders on SM
15 types of Social media contest
Planning your SMM strategy & content bucket
Gauging Social media performance and growth
AI for social media

modules.title: MODULE 2
modules.subtitle: INSTAGRAM FOR BUSINESS
modules.overview: After helping more than 10+ clients, we bring forward the best strategies to you that will help your business brand achieve relevant followers and you will learn to monetize them. Learn from the experts on the best strategies to manage an Instagram page for top national and international clients.
points: Learn the art of growing followers on the most popular social media channels
Optimize and polish your bio
Content generation and video making
Hashtags, Stories, and Reels
Understanding advanced analytics to make informed decisions
Basics of Instagram advertisements
How to generate sales from Instagram
Local, National, and Global case studies
Influencer Marketing - How to approach and types, how to work with them
AI for Instagram Scripts
Ways to engage followers
InstaChamp
Analytics

modules.title: MODULE 3
modules.subtitle: LINKEDIN PERSONAL BRANDING
modules.overview: LinkedIn is the world’s largest professional networking platform, connecting over 930 million members across 200+ countries. It allows you to showcase your profile, expertise, recommendations, and connections—making it easier for recruiters and employers to find you.
points: What Makes LinkedIn Different? – Why it’s the #1 platform for personal branding, authority building, and inbound lead generation.
Opportunities for Everyone – Student, job seeker, professional, or entrepreneur.
Do You Really Need LinkedIn Premium? – A breakdown of whether the investment is worth it for your goals.
Networking Like a Pro – How to connect with industry leaders and decision-makers to expand your influence.
Profile Optimization Secrets – The VCAE Blueprint to 10x your visibility and attract the right opportunities.
Mastering LinkedIn Connections – The right way to grow your network strategically.
The Magic of Content – How LinkedIn’s dwell algorithm works and how to create posts that get seen.
Content Scheduling for Consistency – Using tools like Publer to stay active without the manual effort.
Hacking LinkedIn’s Algorithm – Boost engagement, maximize reach, and establish authority.
Cold Outreach That Works – How to send messages that get responses and turn connections into business opportunities.
LinkedIn Ads – Worth the Investment? – Understanding ROI potential.
If you’re not leveraging LinkedIn the right way, you’re leaving money and opportunities on the table.

points: Psychology and Objective of Facebook Ads
How to understand client needs

New Ad account method

Understanding custom audience and look-alike audience
Creating 1% - 5% look-alike audience
Creating video views custom audience
Creating custom audience on basis of URL parameters
Creating custom audience on basis of Social Media engagement
Understanding Facebook Ad results, Pixel Integrations
Custom conversion pixel
Understanding funnels
Creating evergreen retargeting
Setting up automated rules
Creating customized reports
Case study discussion
Different types of Ads that works – Dynamic Ads, Catalog Ads, Reel Ads
Lead Generation Campaign, Creating conversion, retargeting campaign
Creating customer avatar
Creating Ad copies
Targeting examples for different industries - Real Estate, Ecommerce, Education, Health Care

modules.title: MODULE 5
modules.subtitle: CONTENT WRITING
modules.overview: Consumers perceive content as a feed to their otherwise occupied mind. When they see your website, they should be convinced enough to open your website and make a purchase or take any of the CTAs. Writing is an art in itself and it is important to write persuasive content to see a positive conversion rate.
points: What is content writing and how does it contribute to your website?
What is SEO-based content writing?
Content research and planning keyword research and its density
Flow & coherence in understanding various online content tools
What is plagiarism and how to avoid it
Monetizing your writing
What are keywords and their types
How to write a blog

modules.title: MODULE 6
modules.subtitle: SEARCH ENGINE OPTIMIZATION
modules.overview: Learn & implement search engine optimisation that produces results! Get your website to the top of the major search engines with a 20-step unique framework to crack any blog or website to rank on top of Google's search engine.
points: Know what is important in a technical audit and how to start one yourself
Boosting SEO with Structured Data Markup
Be able to optimize on-page content with the right keywords & page structure
Understand what a good URL structure is and how you can influence crawl behavior
Finding places to get great links to your site
Know how to use JavaScript frameworks to influence technical SEO
Easily create XML sitemaps to help you better understand content & index rates
Be skilled at marking up your content with structured data so it can extract entities
Be able to decide on the right domain strategy, URL structure, content & keywords while working across multiple countries
Learn Link Building Strategies and get backlinks with over 30+ DA sites without paying

modules.title: MODULE 7
modules.subtitle: SEARCH ENGINE MARKETING
modules.overview: Learn an amazing framework designed by the team of Digital Scholar and get a full suite of execution tactics to follow so you’re always running ads that hit the right targets and get you the results you need.
points: How to set up your Google Ads account from scratch
Understand PPC temperatures – so you can follow the law of conversion intent
Set up conversion tracking and how to track phone calls from your website
Track sales, revenue and form submissions using Google AdWords
Take advantage of competitor reports and customer data in your campaigns
Increase quality score and decrease your cost per click
Be a master of targeting and A/B split testing. Find the best optimization routine
Scale all types of campaigns – so that you can scale up your campaigns after you’ve achieved better ROAS and CPA

modules.title: MODULE 8
modules.subtitle: DIGITAL DESIGN MASTERY
modules.overview: Design principles, Canva mastery, social post creation, and FB Ad creatives — everything you need to create high-performing visuals.

What are design principles

Understanding Canva Interface and Core elements Establishing your Brand Kit using Canva

modules.title: MODULE 9
modules.subtitle: VIDEO EDITING
modules.overview: Learning video editing is a rewarding skill that can open up a lot of creative possibilities.
points: Understand the Basics of Video Editing
Cutting and Trimming: Learning how to cut and trim video clips is essential.
Transitions: Learn how to use transitions between scenes or clips.
Audio Editing: Ensuring audio levels are correct, including background music, voiceovers, and sound effects.
Text and Titles: Text can be used to add titles, captions, and credits. Learn how to place and animate text.
Basic Color Correction: Adjusting brightness, contrast, saturation, and hue to make your video look polished.

modules.title: MODULE 10
modules.subtitle: PERSONAL BRANDING
modules.overview: Your content is the gateway to your personal brand. On Instagram & LinkedIn, every post should capture attention, build credibility, and drive engagement. Writing isn’t just about words — it’s about making an impact.
points: How to write engaging posts that boost your authority
SEO-based content strategies to increase reach
Researching, planning & using the right keywords
Maintaining flow, coherence & storytelling
Avoiding plagiarism & ensuring originality
Monetizing your content through personal branding
The power of hashtags & LinkedIn SEO
Writing compelling posts that spark conversations
Craft content that makes people stop, engage, and remember your brand!
